ee anuwa, maranthika wairasaya parajaya kirima sandaha jathyantharayata aaradhana karana china rajaya mema asathya thorathuru pracharayata sahaya nodena lesata da shri lankikayangen da illimak karanawa.esema waraya 5kin prathikshepa wu em.es.westardam magi naukawata kambojaye - sihanokwil warayata athulu wimata awasara labadi thibenawa.magin 1455 deneku saha 802 denekugen samanwitha karya mandala samaga mema naukawa pasugiya pebarawari palamuwanada honkon sita gaman aarambha kara aththe dina 14ka sancharayak sandaha bawayi wides wartha sandahan kale.me athara, wasangatha roga widya eekakaye wisheshagnya waidya sudath samarawira hiru prawruththi anshayata sandahan kale meratata paminena wideshikayan akhanda parikshanawalata lak karamin rata thulata muda harina bawayi.

wishama ragaya, dweshaya, nima nowi bhawayen bhawaya pawa gaman karana baddha wairaya, kala upakara amathakawima, gunamakukama thamange mathaya pamanak niwaradi yayi sanatha kara ganime upaya, anunge sapatha, sathuta noiwasana bawa (eershyawa) thaman paribhojanaya nokirima, anunta paribhojanayata ida nodima, thaman usas kota salakima, anun pahathkota salakima, jathi, kula, gothra, dana ugathkam thaman ha anun sansandanaya, thaman usas anun pahath, anun pahath thaman usas, pahath aya usas, usas aya pahath, pahath ayath usas ayath samanayi aadi aakalpa athi kara ganima, thamange gathi lakshana, swabhawa kriyakarakam, wachana thulin mathwima aadi wu aneka chaithasika upadi.
